description: This file defines the PartnerRepository interface extending JpaRepository for managing Partner entities, including a custom query method to find partners by owner user ID where 'deleted' is false.

classes.name: PartnerRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for Partner entity, providing CRUD operations and custom query method.

methods.name: findByOwnerUserIdAndDeletedFalse
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Partner entities with the specified owner user ID where the 'deleted' attribute is false.
